name: Block Infiltration Operations
description: Block Infiltration Operations is our first main release of a game. It is a computer game that can be downloaded or played on the internet. The game is a 2D overhead stealth style game where you try to complete missions in the fastest time possible. During the missions you must avoid enemies, enemy sight lines, and security camera sight lines. Your radar can be used to see things that are off of the screen, and can even detect the enemy/camera sight lines. You much reach the star goal to complete the level, doing so as fast as you can. The level select screen will show your best times for each level. Can you get the fastest times possible and beat your friends?
